name: Confident AI
headline: The DeepEval LLM Evaluation Platform
description: Confident AI allows companies of all sizes to benchmark, safeguard, and improve LLM applications, with best-in-class metrics and guardrails powered by DeepEval. Built by the creators of DeepEval (4.3k stars, >400k monthly downloads), Confident AI is able to offer battle-tested, open-source evaluation algorithms while providing the infrastructure needed for teams to stay confident their LLM systems.

founders.name: Jeffrey Ip, CEO & Cofounder
founders.description: Creator of DeepEval, the open-source LLM evaluation framework. and grew it to over 400k monthly downloads and counting. Previously SWE @ Google, Microsoft.

founders.name: Kritin Vongthongsri, Co-Founder
founders.description: Building the #1 LLM Evaluation Platform & empowering teams to red-team and safeguard LLM apps. AI Researcher and CHI-published author, previously built NLP pipelines for fintech startup and researched self-driving cars/HCI during @ Princeton (ORFE'24 + CS).

# The DeepEvalLLMEvaluationPlatform.
Built by the creators of DeepEval, companies of all sizes use Confident AI to benchmark, safeguard, and improve LLM applications, with best-in-class metrics and guardrails.
[Request a Demo](https://confident-ai.com/</book-a-demo>)[Try Now For Free](https://confident-ai.com/<https:/app.confident-ai.com?utm_source=landing>)
[*Learn how Confident AI help Supernormal cut LLM cost by 80%![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64bd90bdba579d6cce245a8a/67b2b7fb26bfc37433725b4e_open%20\(1\).svg)](https://confident-ai.com/<https:/confident-ai.com/case-study/supernormal>)

## LLM Evaluation, Done Right.
Confident AI's core features ensures you do LLM evaluations the proper way to achieve the best possible LLM testing results required for iteration.
Curate Dataset
Annotate datasets on Confident AI and pull it from the cloud for evaluation.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64bd90bdba579d6cce245a8a/679054d8647e48895e39c909_right-arrow%20\(1\).svg)
Run Evaluations
Benchmark LLM systems to experiment with different implementations.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64bd90bdba579d6cce245a8a/679054d8647e48895e39c909_right-arrow%20\(1\).svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64bd90bdba579d6cce245a8a/679054d8647e48895e39c909_right-arrow%20\(1\).svg)
Improve Dataset
Keep your dataset up to date with the latest realistic, production data.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64bd90bdba579d6cce245a8a/679054d8647e48895e39c909_right-arrow%20\(1\).svg)
Align Evaluation Metrics
Tailor your LLM metric results to your specific use case/criteria.
## Curate Datasets On One, Centralized Platform.
Dump Google Sheets, Notion, or whatever your domain experts are currently using to curate evaluation datasets, and let Confident AI unify your LLM evaluation workflow.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64bd90bdba579d6cce245a8a/6789b26cf02a940c73c19c46_browser-blue.png)
Your browser does not support the video tag. 
evaluate.py
1
2
3
4
5
6
fromdeepeval.datasetsimportEvaluationDataset
fromdeepeval.metricsimportAnswerRelevancy
dataset=EvaluationDataset(‍)
dataset.pull(alias="QADataset"‍)
dataset.evaluate(metrics=[AnswerRelevancy()])
## Move Fast, Don't Break Things.
Our Pytest integration enables you to unit test LLM systems in CI/CD, compare test results, detect performance drift, without changing the way you work.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64bd90bdba579d6cce245a8a/678ac192a51c7fe457b3ef7e_browser-emerald.png)
Your browser does not support the video tag. 
test_llm.py
1
2
3
4
5
6
7
8
9
fromdeepevalimportassert_test,LLMTestCase,EvaluationDataset
fromdeepeval.metricsimportAnswerRelevancy
dataset=EvaluationDataset(‍)
dataset.pull(alias="QADataset"‍)
@pytest.mark.parametrize(‍"test_case",dataset)
deftest_llm_app(test_case:LLMTestCase‍):
assert_test(test_case,metrics=[AnswerRelevancy()]‍)
bash
>pipinstall-Udeepeval
>deepevaltestruntest_llm.py
✓TestRunCompleted.
✓1/1testcase(s)passing.
## Monitor & Trace, To Improve Evaluation Data.
Confident AI will automatically evaluate monitored LLM outputs, and let you decide on which real-world data to include in your dataset for subsequent testing.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64bd90bdba579d6cce245a8a/678ad03dbe20ae89df1d6a3b_browser-pink.png)
Your browser does not support the video tag. 
main.py
1
2
3
4
5
6
7
8
9
importdeepeval
#afteryourLLMhasfinishedgenerating
deepeval.monitor(
input="WhateverinputyourLLMisgetting",
response="WhateveryourLLMhasgenerated",
model="gpt-4o",
*kwarg
)
## Annotate Once, to Align Metrics With Expectations.
Everyone has their own opinions, and Confident AI is here to make sure your evaluation metrics are as aligned with your company's values as possible.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64bd90bdba579d6cce245a8a/678b74d4aaf08b1557907d75_browser-amber.png)
Your browser does not support the video tag. 
WARNING: NOT REAL CODE. COPY & PASTE AT YOUR OWN RISK.
1
2
3
4
ifneeds_improvement(your_llm_app):
you_need_confident=True
else:
you_need_confident=False
## Our Evaluation Way Is Proudly Open-Source
I mean, how else could we possibly deliver you the best evaluation results?
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64bd90bdba579d6cce245a8a/6781b3513abb57e6eefca4cb_github%20\(1\).svg)confident-ai/deepeval![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64bd90bdba579d6cce245a8a/663f691918bd941c31328f05_star%20\(1\).svg)4.6k](https://confident-ai.com/<https:/github.com/confident-ai/deepeval>)
300,000+
Daily evaluations
200+
Github stars
100,000+

## WARNING: You'll Hate Confident If...
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64bd90bdba579d6cce245a8a/679b7ed9a97b79c676f2e3fd_black-box.svg)
You love mysteries and being kept in the dark
Sorry, we don't hide our metrics behind APIs that "beat the SOTA benchmark by 36%".
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64bd90bdba579d6cce245a8a/679dd30ed718f86a621c94f7_spin.svg)
You love wasting time going around in circles
We help you make sure that iterations only lead to improvements, not regressions.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64bd90bdba579d6cce245a8a/679dd14258806d37bac2c0d7_arrow-down.svg)
You have low standards for evaluation metrics
Unfortunately for you, we put a lot of care in tailoring metrics and ongoing alignment. 
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64bd90bdba579d6cce245a8a/679b833df786edf1436a69dd_csv%20\(1\).svg)
You think “collaboration” means sharing a messy CSV file
That's great, but we built Confident for teams, even for non-technical members.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64bd90bdba579d6cce245a8a/679dd11458806d37bac2a1d3_urgent.svg)
You're OK waiting days for support to "get in touch shortly"
We actually respond. Fast. Our team is here to help, not hide behind chatbots. 
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64bd90bdba579d6cce245a8a/679dd1bd43a4bf337911c200_directions.svg)
You prefer using multiple tools instead of one
Red-teaming, guardrails, observability, anything else we missed on your checklist?
## Automated LLM red teaming to detect safety risks.
Discovery which combination of hyperparameters such as LLMs and prompt templates works best for your LLM app.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64bd90bdba579d6cce245a8a/65573444b200df2e6bd2199b_thunder.svg)
2.4x
### Less time to production
No more time wasted on finding breaking changes.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64bd90bdba579d6cce245a8a/65573635151351e86580c516_flask%20\(2\).svg)
1.42m
### Evaluations completed
Users evaluate by writing and executing test cases in python.

generated_description:
**Confident AI: Benchmarking the Future of LLM Applications**

Founded in 2024 and part of Y Combinator Batch W25, Confident AI is a promising startup based in San Francisco. With a two-member team, their mission is clear: they aim to empower organizations of all sizes to benchmark, secure, and enhance their Large Language Model (LLM) applications using the DeepEval LLM Evaluation Platform. 

**What They Offer**

At the core of Confident AI’s offerings are best-in-class metrics and guardrails powered by their flagship tool, DeepEval, which has garnered over 4.3k stars and half a million monthly downloads on GitHub. This platform provides battle-tested, open-source evaluation algorithms, allowing teams to maintain confidence in their LLM systems. Key products include:

- **LLM Evaluation**: This tool benchmarks LLM systems, optimizing on prompts and models while detecting regressions.
- **LLM Observability**: It enables users to monitor, trace, and A/B test LLM performance, delivering real-time insights.

**Why It Matters**

Confident AI is offering a structured approach to what is often a murky field of LLM evaluation. Many companies struggle to find reliable ways to measure the performance of AI models, and Confident AI aims to eliminate the guesswork. Their suite of tools allows teams to curate and update datasets, run evaluations, and tailor metrics to fit their specific criteria.

**The Open-Source Philosophy**

One of the standout elements of Confident AI is its commitment to open-source solutions. This ethos of transparency not only builds trust with their user base but also fosters collaboration. Users can enhance their own tools with the knowledge that the evaluation metrics are continuously refined based on community input and real-world applications.

**Client Impact and Scalability**

Companies have already started to see substantial benefits from using Confident AI. For instance, they assisted Supernormal in reducing LLM costs by 80%! Such statistics underline their potential in helping organizations not only save money but also improve the effectiveness of their AI deployments.

**Final Thoughts**

As AI continues to penetrate various sectors at an accelerated pace, tools like Confident AI's platform will be crucial in ensuring these systems are not only functional but efficient. For businesses looking to harness the power of LLMs, building confidence in the technology is vital—and that's precisely what Confident AI brings to the table. 

If you're interested in diving deeper or want to see these tools in action, you can explore more on their website: [Confident AI](https://confident-ai.com).
